text.__SUMMARY__: Bothrops lojanus, or the Lojan lancehead, is a species of venomous pit viper in the family Viperidae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Geographic range: It is found in Ecuador in the provinces of Loja and Zamora-Chinchipe.
text.Further reading: Parker, H.W. 1930. Two new reptiles from southern Ecuador. Ann. Mag. Nat. Hist., Series 10, 5: 568-571.
